title: Matrix Botnet Exploits IoT Devices in Widespread DDoS Botnet Campaign
description: A threat actor named Matrix has been linked to a widespread distributed denial-of-service (DoD) campaign that leverages vulnerabilities and misconfigurations in Internet of Things (IoT) devices to co-opt them into a disruptive botnet.
